summary: This document appears to be a client relationship agreement from UBS, detailing the terms and conditions for account management, including margin agreements and electronic delivery consent. It includes acknowledgments from the account holder regarding the understanding of the terms and the implications of margin privileges.

persons.name: Scott Stedman
persons.context: Scott Stedman is mentioned as a financial advisor associated with the accounts referenced in the document.

persons.name: Lyle Casdel
persons.context: Lyle Casdel is also mentioned as a financial advisor related to the accounts in the document.

keyFacts: The document outlines the terms of a Client Relationship Agreement with UBS.
It includes a margin agreement that allows UBS to hold securities as collateral.
The document mentions that certain accounts are not eligible for margin privileges.
Scott Stedman and Lyle Casdel are identified as financial advisors for the accounts.
There is a pre-dispute arbitration clause included in the agreement.
